021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.Platform;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.PluginEngine;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.CallbackManager;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.CallbackProvider;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.channel.ChannelMessageManager;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.LogProvider;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ServerConnector;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDProvider;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.impl.provider.BaseUUIDProvider;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.TranslationProvider;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageManager;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.module.ModuleLoader;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.module.cache.ModuleFileCache;
036import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.UpdateChecker;
037import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
038import revxrsal.commands.Lamp;
039import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
040import revxrsal.commands.orphan.Orphans;
041
042import java.io.File;
043import java.util.UUID;
044import java.util.regex.Pattern;
045
046public class PluginCore {
047
048  /*
049   * Core final variables utilized within TNPC.
050   */
051  public static final Pattern UUID_MATCHER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("(\\w{8})(\\w{4})(\\w{4})(\\w{4})(\\w{12})");
052  public static final Pattern USERNAME_MATCHER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("^\\w*$");
053  /* Plugin Instance */
054  private static PluginCore instance;
055  private final MessageHandler messenger;
056
057  /* Key Managers and Object instances utilized with TNE */
058  /* Core non-final variables utilized within TNPC as settings */
059  protected File directory;
060  //The DebugLevel that the server is currently running in.
061  protected DebugLevel level = DebugLevel.STANDARD;
062  //General Key Object Instances
063  protected LogProvider logger;
064  protected PluginEngine engine;
065  //Manager Instances
066  protected ServerConnector server;
067  protected UUIDProvider uuidProvider;
068  protected CallbackManager callbackManager;
069  protected ChannelMessageManager channelMessageManager;
070
071  protected ModuleLoader loader;
072  protected ModuleFileCache moduleCache;
073  protected UUID serverID;
074  protected Platform platform;
075  protected String version;
076  private boolean enabled = false;
077
078  public PluginCore(final PluginEngine engine, final ServerConnector server, final LogProvider logger,
079                    final TranslationProvider provider, final CallbackProvider callbackProvider,
080                    final Platform platform, final String version) {
081
082    this.server = server;
083    this.logger = logger;
084    this.engine = engine;
085    this.messenger = new MessageHandler(provider);
086    this.callbackManager = new CallbackManager(callbackProvider);
087
088    this.platform = platform;
089    this.version = version;
090  }
091
092  public static void setInstance(final PluginCore core) {
093
094    if(instance == null) {
095      instance = core;
096    } else {
097      throw new IllegalStateException("PluginCore has already been initiated. Please refrain from attempting" +
098                                      "to modify the instance variable.");
099    }
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * The implementation's {@link LogProvider}.
104   *
105   * @return The log provider.
106   */
107  public static LogProvider log() {
108
109    return instance.logger;
110  }
111
112  /**
113   * The {@link StorageManager} we are utilizing.
114   *
115   * @return The {@link StorageManager}.
116   */
117  public static StorageManager storage() {
118
119    return instance.engine.storage();
120  }
121
122  /**
123   * The {@link ServerConnector} for the implementation.
124   *
125   * @return The {@link ServerConnector} for the implementation.
126   */
127  public static ServerConnector server() {
128
129    return instance.server;
130  }
131
132  public static MessageHandler messenger() {
133
134    return instance.messenger;
135  }
136
137  public static File directory() {
138
139    return instance.directory;
140  }
141
142  public static CallbackManager callbacks() {
143
144    return instance.callbackManager;
145  }
146
147  public static ModuleLoader loader() {
148
149    return instance.loader;
150  }
151
152  @Nullable
153  public static UpdateChecker update() {
154
155    return instance.engine.update();
156  }
157
158  public static PluginCore instance() {
159
160    return instance;
161  }
162
163  public static UUIDProvider uuidProvider() {
164
165    return instance.uuidProvider;
166  }
167
168  public static PluginEngine engine() {
169
170    return instance.engine;
171  }
172
173  protected void onLoad() {
174
175    this.engine.load();
176
177    if(!directory.exists()) {
178      final boolean created = directory.mkdir();
179      if(!created) {
180        logger.error("Failed to create plugin directory. Disabling plugin.", DebugLevel.OFF);
181        return;
182      }
183    }
184    this.serverID = UUID.randomUUID();
185
186    this.uuidProvider = new BaseUUIDProvider();
187
188    this.engine.registerConfigs();
189
190    this.engine.initComponents(platform, version);
191    this.engine.initRegistries(platform, version);
192
193    this.engine.registerCallbacks(callbackManager);
194
195    this.engine.postLoad();
196  }
197
198  public void enable() {
199
200    if(!enabled) {
201
202      this.enabled = true;
203      this.loader = new ModuleLoader();
204      onEnable();
205
206    } else {
207      throw new IllegalStateException("PluginCore has already been enabled!");
208    }
209  }
210
211  /**
212   * Used to enable the core. This should contain things that can't be initialized until after the
213   * server software is operational.
214   */
215  protected void onEnable() {
216
217    //Load our modules
218    loader.load();
219
220    //Call onEnable for all modules loaded.
221    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().enable(this)));
222
223    //Call initConfigurations for all modules loaded.
224    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().initConfigurations(directory)));
225
226    //Register the callback listeners and callbacks for the modules
227    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->{
228      moduleWrapper.getModule().registerCallbacks().forEach((key, entry)->{
229        callbackManager.addCallback(key, entry);
230      });
231
232      moduleWrapper.getModule().registerListeners().forEach((key, function)->{
233        callbackManager.addConsumer(key, function);
234      });
235    }));
236
237    this.engine.postConfigs();
238
239    this.channelMessageManager = new ChannelMessageManager();
240
241    this.engine.registerPluginChannels();
242
243    this.channelMessageManager.register();
244
245    this.engine.registerStorage();
246    if(this.engine.storage() == null) {
247      logger.warning("Storage engine not initialized, proceeding without storage!", DebugLevel.OFF);
248    } else {
249      if(!storage().meetsRequirement()) {
250        logger.error("This server does not meet SQL requirements needed!", DebugLevel.OFF);
251        return;
252      }
253    }
254
255    this.engine.postStorage();
256
257    //Call the enableSave method for all modules loaded.
258    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().enableSave(this.engine.storage())));
259
260    //register our commands
261    this.engine.registerCommandHandler();
262
263    //Register our help writer.
264    //command().setHelpWriter(engine::commandHelpWriter);
265
266    //Register our commands.
267    this.engine.registerCommands();
268
269    //Call our command methods for the modules.
270    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->{
271      moduleWrapper.getModule().registerCommands(this.engine.command());
272    }));
273
274
275    this.engine.postCommands();
276
277    this.engine.registerMenuHandler();
278
279    //Call enableMenu for all modules loaded.
280    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().enableMenu(this.engine.menu())));
281
282    this.moduleCache = new ModuleFileCache();
283
284    this.engine.registerUpdateChecker();
285
286    this.engine.postEnable();
287  }
288
289  public void registerModuleCommands(final Lamp<?> lamp) {
290
291    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().registerAdminSub().forEach(orphanCommand->{
292      lamp.register(Orphans.path("tne").handler(orphanCommand));
293    })));
294
295    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().registerMoneySub().forEach(orphanCommand->{
296      lamp.register(Orphans.path("money").handler(orphanCommand));
297    })));
298
299    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().registerTransactionSub().forEach(orphanCommand->{
300      lamp.register(Orphans.path("transaction").handler(orphanCommand));
301    })));
302  }
303
304  public void onDisable() {
305
306    loader.getModules().values().forEach((moduleWrapper->moduleWrapper.getModule().disable(this)));
307
308    this.engine.postDisable();
309  }
310
311  public ChannelMessageManager getChannelMessageManager() {
312
313    return channelMessageManager;
314  }
315
316  public ModuleFileCache moduleCache() {
317
318    return moduleCache;
319  }
320
321  public DebugLevel getLevel() {
322
323    return level;
324  }
325
326  public void setLevel(final DebugLevel level) {
327
328    this.level = level;
329  }
330
331  public Lamp<? extends CommandActor> command() {
332
333    return engine.command();
334  }
335
336  public UUID getServerID() {
337
338    return serverID;
339  }
340
341  public void setServerID(final UUID serverID) {
342
343    this.serverID = serverID;
344  }
345
346  public void setCallbackManager(final CallbackManager callbackManager) {
347
348    this.callbackManager = callbackManager;
349  }
350}
